Relaxed Fit
column16: I never owned the original fitted swiftly tech shirts because I cannot stand clothes clinging to me like that and they just seemed way too long. I LOVE THIS SHIRT I bought it in every color EXCEPT white (and reading the reviews after I'm glad that I didn't get the white) and probably going to get more as duplicates because that is how much I love them. I am a 36D and approx. a size 6-8 mainly an 8, 158lbs and the size 8 in this top was perfect. Loose enough around the waist and body without being too baggy which the 10 looked like it was just too long on me (I am 5'5 and don't have a very long torso or front). This top is just amazing, cannot say enough good things about it. I washed it in normal cycle cold water and threw it into the dryer for about 5 minutes just to get wrinkles out and then laid flat to dry and it never snagged or stretched. GET THIS TOP!

column12: fabric quality, fabric texture, misleading item name
column14: Very disappointed in the fabric texture and quality
column16: I REALLY wanted to like the roomier, relaxed fit version of the Swiftly Tech short sleeve shirt, because the regular one is tight, but these shirts are NOT made of the regular Swiftly Tech material at all. I really liked the fit, but the fabric texture and quality are drastically different -- slicker, heavier, not as soft, shinier, itchier, etc. Not good. They did not look or feel the same, so should not be called Swiftly Tech! I own and love a number of long sleeve shirts, short sleeve shirts, and tanks in the Swiftly original fabric, but this specific style is different. Be warned! There is nothing in the Fabric section of the item description that would indicate this difference, but after trying them on, I couldn't possibly buy them, because the fabric was so uncomfortable. Why would the company advertise these as Swiftly Tech, when the fabric we've come to trust and love isn't even used? Beyond me.
column18:

Thanks for making time to share your experience with the Swiftly Tech Short Sleeve. It's disappointing to hear that the fabric isn't what you expected.

We want you to know, feedback is at the heart of everything we do and we'd love to make this experience right for you. We have sent you an email outlining a few options.

column14: Just What I Needed In My Life!!
column16: Lululemon really answered my prayers with this one. I have owned a few regular swiftly tech shirts, but wasn't a huge fan of them, because I did not like how skin tight they were. Then, when they came out with the swiftly tech breeze in long sleeve form, I was so so happy! They fit so well on me and i felt so comfortable. I bought 3 of them in one day and i was just so excited to workout in them. But, with the warmer months coming up, i knew i wouldn't be able to wear them for too long, because it would be too hot. This is exactly what i needed! I do not own one yet, but i already know that i will love it! I hope I am able to buy one soon. Thank You Lululemon, You hit it out of the park!
The headband became extremely loose after 2 times of wearing. It’s okay for casual wear. But not for working out.

This is the “cardio” headband meaning it should hold up when running. I just got it in the mail today before going on my sunset run and i had to take it off in the middle of my run. It does not stay on my head and it stretches out immediately. I own other lululemon headbands and this has to be the worst one. Will not buy again.

column16: I have thick, long, mermaid-goddess hair, this is the FIRST headband that that I have ever been able to wear that keeps up with my workouts (personal training, spin, yoga, rock-climbing) AND wont give me a headache. I have no idea how they did it, but it stays in place, doesn't pull hair out when you go to remove it, but also sits gently enough on your hair to not leave a huge dent where it was.
This headband stays put no matter what! I Love It!
Love these headbands. I have a small head and slippery hair, so the headbands still creep back from time to time, but I found they stay in best when my hair is in braids or in looser updos.
I really wanted this to work... such a cute headband. It stretched out after 2 wears and does not stay on my head at all. :( very disappointed.

column16: These are for looks only. They do nothing but adorn your head. If you don't sweat or just want something to hold your hair back, don't waste your money on these headbands. Not even close to worth the price.

I absolutely love this headband! I have about 10 and I wear them almost everyday to soccer and cross country. They never fall off. Please make a Neon Green one and a Solid Navy Blue one! I will buy these forever!!

I just can't run with it. I can walk around with it on my head with zero problems, but when I start running or jogging even it slips off. At first, when I bought it, I was very excited, but after I started to run, I got very frustrated, it started to slip off my head and I end up tying it around my wrist. It stretched to over an inch... yeah... so I bought another one because I thought-HOPED (like I really did hope) maybe the first one was flawed... I guess I'll see!

column14: love, but need in solid black color!!
column16: love this headband!! it's perfect, stays in place. but i wish they would make it in solid black!! please make completely black one, would be perfect. i've been trying to find a headband that actually fits and stays in place and this one does. only thing that could make it better was if it came in solid black!!

column14: Looks Good and Does It's Job
column16: I really like this headband. It's thinner than the rest which I like and comes in a lot of nice colours. I've worn it a bunch of times and haven't experienced any stretching yet, but it may still be early to tell. It did stay in place in my hair though which is good.

column14: Cute but doesnt stay in place
column16: I had to readjust this headband multiple times during my practice and also during regular activities. I did like the velvet though, keeps my hairs from being pulled. Why is it so hard to find a headband that stays on my head? :( Disappointed that i spent $14 on this.. should have gotten another scrunchie instead.
column18:
Hey cameforsavasana,
We stand behind the quality of our gear and would love to know more about your experience with this. Please give our Guest Education Centre a call at 1.877.263.9300 to chat through some options.

column16: I bought this a while back and when I saw it on sale again I figured I would read the reviews because I thought I may be the only one that experienced the stretch out factor. I see this is an issue many have had. I would stick to the larger headband as this headband has been one of few disappoints from lulu.

I'll start out by saying I absolutely love the larger headband, flyaway tamer I believe. This one on the other hand is a huge let down. It does not stay in place, which leads to a frustrating hair situation while working out. I completely recommend the larger one but this one is a waste of money.

column12: stretched out, wears out too fast
column16: I bought two of these headbands a couple weeks ago, pre we made too much, and I love them. I never liked the big banded headbands and the smaller band keeps the hair out of my face while I run and do yoga. The only problem is they are already super stretched out, to the point were I can't even wear them anymore. I'm really disappointed because I love lululemon and i know I can't even exchange because they are wore:/
column18:
Hey LexiLaurennn,
Thanks for sharing your feedback with us. I'm sorry to hear of your experience with the Cardio Cross Trainer Headband and can understand your disappointment. We'd love to help turn this around so please keep your eyes out for a follow-up email headed your way with the next steps.

column12: durability of product, quality of material
column14: Cute but Stretched Out Almost Immediatly
column16: Really dissapointed in this headband. It is super cute, but after wearing it for just a few hours the material has stretched out and lost much of it elasticity. I've always been loyal to Lululemon, but this headband was a huge disappointment.
column18:
Hey Yogimedstudent,
Thanks for connecting with us and sharing your feedback. We'd love to find a fix for the stretching out you're experiencing, and have gone ahead and sent you a follow up email. Chat with you soon.

column12: doesn't stay in place, stretches overtime
column14: Great to have during a sweaty workout but stretches!
column16: This headband is great to have during a long workout because it wicks most sweat but I found myself constantly having to readjust it throughout my workout. Each time I use it I find it getting more stretched over time.
column18:
Hey owensmo2,
An email is currently making its way to you so we can follow up on the stretching you're experiencing with your Cardio Cross Trainer Headband and some solutions for you moving forward.

column12: they weren't good for sports, colors
column16: The old headbands were way better, the colors were so pretty too. you should get out some fall colors because, i will buy all of them and some people would too. but these hand bands aren't good at all the slide off your head when u just put it on!.! also if u bring the old headbands back u would get more people to buy it, plus they are way better for sports.

column14: old school lululemon was better quality
column16: I have lots of headbands from a couple years ago and they were awesome, the new ones are TERRIBLE! I just bought my 4th "new" one and it will be the last one that I buy. I wear them once and they immediately lose their elasticity, I always think that I am doing something wrong with my headbands that I have this issue, but after reading multiple reviews of others having the same problem, I feel a little better knowing its not me...it's a shame because I love lululemon but these are the worst ones ever.

column12: slips off a bit, seems to run big, not very sweat-wicking
column14: cute, decent headband but it's too big!
column16: I've worn this headband running and to hot yoga. Decently tames my hair, so-so at sweat-wicking (still had sweat dripping down my face), but it seems to have stretched out! I have other styles of headbands, but this feels so loose on my head, especially after 1 wear. I wash all my workout stuff in cold and line-dry, so I'm not sure what happened.
column18:
Hey birdski,
We'd love to help turn this around as we do stand by the quality of our gear. Please keep your eyes peeled for a follow up email coming your way shortly.

column16: I love Lululemon and I continue to splurge because the quality is exceptional. But this headband was a let down. I do not like to post negative comments but the design of this headband was one that did not work at all. I gave it a few chances, I wore it to a yoga class and had to remove the headband after 5 minutes of the class- So frustrating. I tried wearing it again when I went for a jog, I had to remove it because I kept fusing with it. I have also tried to wear this headband just to run errands and it managed to slip around :( I have very curly hair so slipping usually isn't a problem. I feel adding an adjustable feature may prevent these issues

column14: My curly hair is now tamed!
column16:
This is my standard headband for yoga, crossfit, yoga and running errands.
I have super curly hair, with many curls popping up in the front my hairline when I start sweating, so the thinner width of this headband keeps the headband in place and not sliding to the back of my ponytail and flyaways tamed.

This is such a nice looking headband...but not functional. I tried it for running but only 10 minutes in it had slipped away and just ended up floating on the crown of my head. If I had not reached up to check on it, I may have lost it on the trail. I tried it again when I got home just walking around the house and the same thing happened after about 15 minutes. The reviews for it are all over the map, so I thought I would try it for myself, but since you cannot return headbands, I just wasted my $.

column9: I KEEP MY AGE ON THE D.L.
column11: big head no squeeze!, cute colors
column16: I have an XL/XXL head with lots of hawaiian hair! I love the look of headbands but they squeeze my head and give me a headache. I love this headband and even though it's skinny it looks cute and holds my flyaways.

I ordered this headband thinking it would be great quality. I love your other products and I am truly upset with how much I have to readjust this when I swear it to work out or even when I'm sitting around the house.
column18:
Hey mjb10,
Thanks for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear of the slipping you're experiencing with your Cardio Cross Trainer Headband! We stand behind our gear and will make things right if a product isn't performing. Please give us a ring at 1.877.263.9300 so we can chat more and find a fix.

column16: I had bought a couple headbands before they changed to the velvet and I loved those, they fit well and stayed in place. Now I find that it's hit or miss.
Love this headband! It doesn't slide on my head, catches sweat, and is a great material.

I was really excited to get this headband in the mail today but once I tried it on for a couple of minutes, it kept slipping off. You constantly have to keep readjusting and it gets aggravating. I do a lot of running and sadly, I'm really disappointed this product didn't work out. Also, double check on the stitching because the headband that I received had a couple of loose threads. On the good side, at least the headband is cute.
column18:
Hi tvln,
Thanks for taking the time to share this feedback with us. We stand behind the quality of our gear, and want to make sure it's performing for you. I understand that this isn't the case, and would like to work with you to find a resolution. I’ve sent you an email to follow up. Chat with you soon.

column16: I noticed a lot of mixed reviews when looking at this headband online. When I went to my local Lulu store I was pleasantly surprised by this headband. I bought it about two weeks ago and overall have been very satisfied. In past experiences with headbands I have found them to be so tight I ended up with a headache and they ultimately slipped farther and farther off my head. For me, this headband has the right amount of stretch, it stays in place, and looks great when wearing it. I would definitely recommend this headband.

column14: Does not stay in place/ a little too loose
column16: I love the look of this headband. But, unfortunately, unlike my other lulu hair accessories, it does not seem to have the same level of grip/tightness. I find that I often have to readjust it, Even when I am just wearing it on a casual hair day and not exercising. I would not buy this particular accessory again.

column14: Great headband, but a little slippy
column16: I love this headband, but I have noticed that it slips more than I'd like it to. I have to readjust it often. It could just be my head bcause I've never really had any luck with headbands when it comes to how much they slip, although I do have Lulu's Fly Away Tamer Headband 2.0, and that one barely slips at all.

I absolutely love the cardio cross trainer. I was a bit upset that they didn't have a black , and there were to many bad reviews on the skinny fly away so I got this one. It stays on my head perfectly it doesn't stretch. I definitely recommend this!
This headband doesn't stay put regardless of what I am doing. I have to readjust it constantly.

column14: Not up to the Lululemon standard
column16: I own a few of these headbands since they come in such cute colors and I like to match the print with the coresponding lulu top. But these headbands tend to not stay on my head and slide around. I do prefer the newer headbands that lulu has made with the more of velvour non slip material on the inside of the gel. The velour ones tend to stay on my head.

I like the look of these headbands but l have to keep readjusting this one to keep it from sliding off. Stays in place ok if you're not doing a lot of movement and activity, but I prefer to put my headband on before a workout and not have to worry about it until my workout is done - this one doesn't make the cut for activity but great for hanging out on a casual hair day.
column18:
Hi CMYF,
Thanks for reaching out to us about your Cardio Cross Trainer Headband. I’m sorry to hear of the you’re experiencing with them. We stand behind the quality of our gear, and we’d like to work with you towards a solve. I’ve sent you an email to follow up and help. Chat with you soon.

column11: color and grips on the inside, nice and stretchy, patterns
column16: I got this head band shipped to me as a gift from my cousin and it's great! Occasionally it slips off my head but over all its a great product. When dirty the grey will start to look darker but once you wash it it goes right back to it's original color. I would definitely recomend this product and plan to buy another one and a sweater.

So disappointed with this headband. I have many other Lululemon apparel and have not had any issues with wash and wear until now. Just purchased this headband less than two weeks ago. Washed it on gentle with another lululemon sweater and it is not the same. Headband worked great for my runs and weight lifting but completely stretched out in the wash.
column18:
Hey BikiniCompetitorKim,
Thank you for reaching out with your feedback. I'm sorry to hear of your experience with your headband stretching out. We fully stand behind the quality of our gear, so I'd like to help you out. Watch for an email that will explain how to move forward.

column12: did not stay in place, slipped back
column14: Disappointing because I love the color choices
column16: The Cardio Cross Trainer headband is a little disappointing. I do like the skinny style, but it just didn't stay in place. I found I was constantly having to pull it off and put it on just to adjust it. I prefer the Skinny Flyaway Tamer to this one. I know it all really depends on your head shape... I do have a hard time finding headbands. This one just isn't worth the $14 in my opinion.

column12: slides off immediately, doesn't stay put, too stretchy
column14: Slides off immediately. Waste of money
column16: After being disappointed by two skinny flyaway headbands, I thought I would give a different style a shot. I was even more disappointed by this one. What a waste of $14. Within two minutes after putting it on, it was sliding off of my head constantly. I wasn't even exercising- just going about everyday activities! A shame because it is very cute and comfy. I would expect that lulu would be able to create one that does what it claims to do actually stays on your head!!

I have read that some of you are having trouble with these staying on your head. My daughter doesn't have thick hair. For her the headbands from this company that have the felt backing are the best for her fine hair. They work awesome and will stay on throughout an entire soccer game with her hair in a ponying tail!

column12: does not function properly / will not stay put
column16: I love Lulu gear, but this headband is not worth the money. I wore it for the first time yesterday for a treadmill run and weightlifting and had to adjust it and pull it forward every 30 seconds. It's too annoying when you want to focus on working out. I wish I could take it back - I expect better from you guys!
column18:
Hey dprun,
Thanks for reaching out to us about your Cardio Cross Trainer Headband. I’m sorry to hear that it won't stay put. We stand behind the quality of our gear, and we’d like to work with you towards a resolution. Please reach out to our GEC at 1.877.263.9300 and one of our educators will be able to help you out.

column16: I have about 12 of these headbands and I love them! I wear them every single day. I don't really expect my headbands to stay on my head for hours but these headbands stay on for a while. I have really thick hair so it isn't a problem but for people with thinner hair you may feel like you have to adjust it more.

Love the color! Fits nicely. I only took a star off because the tear-away tag is attached so well when you go to pull it off it pulls at the seams of the headband causing a little fly away threads...not a huge deal though. Not sure why everyone is complaining about the skinny style....I actually prefer these skinny headbands over the wide thicker ones...! They stay on better :)

column14: Love them and own 7 of them
column16: I have shorter hair and can only wear pigtails to get the hair off my neck. These are my favorite headbands by far. I wear them to run, hot yoga, under my helmet when I ride my bike, and casually on the weekends. I like that they don't have a lot of silicone, which ends up sticking to my hair and pulling it. Out of the 7 headbands I own, the first one I bought could be tighter (neon pink) as it has slipped off once or twice. The other 6, which I bought later, stay put and feel perfectly tight on my head, without being too tight.

The headband stays on very well and is super cute! Not sure what the other reviewers mean. I got the pink and it is super cute and easy to wear. Really pleased with shipping bc it was free and only took 3 days(:
Looks like I am one of the only ones ... but, this headband stays put. I'd say 90% of headbands slip off on me, but not this one. This is the same material as the swiftly shirts.

This headband was my first ever purchase from Lululemon and I am afraid that it may be my last. I normally wear headbands from other athleisure bands like Nordstrom's Zella but decided to try Lulu after seeing many of my classmates wear their tanks and leggings in Pure Barre. I wear my hair up in my PB class and this headband was falling off my head within the first few minutes of class. Even after the warm up, the headband would not stay on without riding back and was more of a distraction than anything. I don't know how Lulu expects people to run with this headband staying in place. I wish I could return it but I already cut off the tags and there is a no-return policy on headbands. The style is cute (2 stars for this), but save your money and don't buy this product.
column18:
Hi ChristineDC,
Thanks for taking the time to let us know about your Cardio Cross Trainer headband. I'm sorry to hear that this one isn't working out for you. We stand behind the quality of our gear, and if a piece isn't performing as intended, then we'd like to make it right. Please visit your local store with your gear, or call our GEC at 1.877.263.9300 and one of our educators can work with you towards a resolution.

column16: I bought this headband a couple of months ago specifically for the grips on the inside. First of all, the fabric is great. It washes well and looks good. It's stretchy and fits to my head fairly well...but that said, whenever I have my hair pulled straight back (like into a bun or a high ponytail), it slips right off my head. I actually had to use bobby pins to get it to stay on, but for 15 dollars, I think that the headband should be able to stay on by itself. However, when I just need it to keep my hair out of my face, it does a pretty good job. Overall, I think that it is not worth the money and that the cons far outweigh the pros. For those reasons, I would not recommend this product.
Very disapointed! Within a few minutes this headband was slipping completely off.

column12: overly stretchy, grips did nothing, fell off
column16: I was ecstatic when my mom gave me one of these headbands for my birthday, as I have been searching for the perfect headband. I run xc and track so the "perfect" headband for me would have to be extremely grippy, which this headband is not. I wore it to dinner one night with my hair up and it didn't even stay on for the first 5 minutes! I found myself taking the headband off and putting it in my sweatshirt pocket. I am extremely disappointed in Lulu as I am an avid buyer. I found the skinny fly away tamer to be my go-to race day headband which sticks on like glue, so I would recommend that headband to anyone looking for a good headband for an athletic lifestyle!

I am very disappointed with this purchase. For this price, I should get a headband that stays on my head. I can't do anything at the gym (even yoga) without this headband falling off. It is a shame that lululemon does not accept returns on headbands!!! Such poor quality
column18: Thanks for taking the time to reach out to us. Know that if our gear doesn't perform for you, we'll take it back- anytime. Swing by your local store to show them what's going on, and they'll help work on a resolution with you. If you're not close to a store, give our GEC a ring - 1.877.263.9300.

column14: regret and wish it could go back to the store!
column16: I'm sooo incredibly disappointed by this headband. I purchased it in the store. The next day tried to wear it to a work out. While getting ready, I just couldn't get this headband to stay on for the life of me. I ended up just throwing it on the floor and leaving to the studio without it. I wish I hadn't taken the tag off of this so it could have been returned. I'm disappointed and disgusted that I spent $14 ($15 with tax) on a headband I never got to use.

column12: doesn't grip the hair to stay in place
column14: Stretches and does NOT stay in place!
column16: I wish I had read these reviews before purchasing! I work 12+ hours as a nurse so I'm always on the hunt for good headbands that stay in place. I found Lululemon's Bang Busters to be absolutely amazing for running, but I didn't want so much fabric bulk at work. A store associate recommended these headbands to me, saying that the material on the inside would grip my hair and help keep it in place. Well, after only one hour on the job, this headband was already creeping it's way up my head. By the end of my shift, it had completely stretched out and wasn't tight on my head at all. I had bought two, so I tried the other one the next day, thinking maybe I had just gotten a bad one. Unfortunately, the other one did the exact same thing. My head isn't unusually large, and based on the other negative reviews, I'd say this is a common theme with these. I'm just so disappointed that I spent nearly $30 on two completely useless headbands. Don't waste your money!
column18:
Hi NicolePR,
I'm really sorry to hear that you didn't have an awesome experience with the Cardio Cross Trainer Headband. I understand where you're coming from here, and would encourage you to head into your local store or ring our GEC at 1.877.263.9300 to chat about ways that we can turn this around for you.

column16: This headband is so comfortable and is very very cute. It grips hair ( in a good way) so the headband doesn't come off! Definitely a must!

I love Lulu, and really wanted to like this headband but I am totally disappointed! I have tried wearing this headband in several different scenarios-out doing errands, teaching spinning classes, running, yoga, but it NEVER stays on! I resorted to just not wearing it at all. It is the perfect size to hold fly-aways back, but it never says on my head because it stretches very easily and hardly has any grips. If you are going to buy a headband, I recommend staying away from this one.

I love Lullaby, so I bought a lullaby headband at 11am in the store. By 5pm it was gone, off my head. We have several acres, and I was all over most of it, so I'm sure if it's not in the house the lawnmower will find it later. It was pretty, but not grippy at ALL. I can't even tell you if it held my hair back, but I assume it didn't because when it left me, I would have felt my hair falling around differently. Since I didn't notice, I would say the headband doesn't even do it's job anyhow.
I am so sad and angry. There were cross back tanks for only $10 more at the store, and I am kicking myself for spending so much on a headband that didn't last 6 hours, when for $10 more I could have had a tank and even if I only wore it one or two times, would have been more worth it. Very disappointed.
column18: I can definitely understand where you're coming from. I have sent you an email to set up a resolution for this experience.

column16: The fabric of this headband is great, unfortunately the purpose of a headband is to hold hair back. Mine did not do this. I got this headband for a half marathon, and unfortunately it fell off somewhere around mile 5. It was very disappointing to constantly wipe my hair off my face. I would not recommend this headband. I have a large sized head too, so it should have definitely stayed on my head.
column18:
Hi Cathy22,
Thanks for reaching out to us about your Cardio Cross Trainer headband. I'm sorry to hear that this piece didn't perform for you. We stand behind the quality of our gear and want you to have things you use and love. Please visit your local store or call our GEC at 1.877.263.9300 and we can make this right for you.

column16: I have bangs so I purchased this headband in hopes of it actually staying on my head.. which it did for about 1 workout. Then it kept falling off of my head and I realized it stretched out after 1 workout. I am a pretty tiny lady so Im used to this happening. Just not worth the money

I'm surprised about the reviews for this headband. I love it! It stays easily on my fine, straight hair through running and spinning. I never have to adjust it. I've tried the fly away tamers, the skinny headbands- none of them worked for me like this one. Wish there was a basic black, not a heathered black. I ran a half marathon with this headband and it never budged.

I'm always skeptical about these types of products because up to now, I have yet to find one that stays on my head. After reading the description of this one and seeing some mixed reviews, I decided to try it anyway. There is a grip on the inside of the headband and thought it would help hold it from slipping off my head. Unfortunately, the same thing happened. It may work to stay on others, but sadly, it didn't for me...

I purchased this headband because I wanted something that would stay put on my head when I run! When I saw the "silicone on the inside grips your hair so this headband stays put without pulling" I thought AWESOME, unfortunately it always slips off my head! I spoke to one of the girls at a store and she just smiles and said "yeah, maybe try having it have contact with skin and it wont slip off." That not very helpful when I want it to keep the hair our of my face. Very disappointed, I was so excited about this one :(
